title: Food Rescue
description: Volunteer in Porto to fight food waste and feed homeless and families in need. Discover Portugal, travel like a local and create a REAL positive social impact.

title: Community Assistant
description: The Missionvale Care Centre focuses on people in need in Missionvale township, and offers a variety of services such as education, healthcare and more

title: Support for Disadvantaged Community
description: We believe that serving others is one of the most worthwhile human endeavors. The main objective of this program is to provide valuable support for community groups

title: Social Welfare Worker
description: Provide quality support to some of the most marginalized people in Cape Town and improve their future prospects.

title: Women and Children Righ
description: The Human Rights program includes working with Tanzanian human rights professionals focusing on Children, Women, and Disabled rights
